verbs.description: [ARG1: The oak sapling] [R-ARG1: that] [V: was] [ARG2: a gift to President Donald Trump from French President Emmanuel Macron] is facing at least two years in quarantine . The leaders planted the tree on the White House lawn during Macron 's state visit in April . But a mystery was spun days later when journalists noticed it had been removed . Macron 's office later said the tree was quarantined like other plants or animals brought ...
